title: Full-Stack Development
body: Proficient in front-end (React, Redux, Bootstrap) and back-end (Flask) development, delivering modern web applications.

title: API Development
body: Expertise in crafting robust RESTful APIs ensures seamless data integration and application communication within projects.

title: Database Design
body: Experienced in designing efficient databases using ERDs and ensuring BCNF normalization for optimal data storage and retrieval.

title: Networking
body: I possess a comprehensive understanding of communication protocols (HTTP, TCP/IP, UDP, TLS/SSL) and have experience working with Unix sockets.
